title: Colin Cowherd Podcast - Joe Burrow on Game Winning Week 6 TD Pass , Viral Coughing Video
itunes:title: Colin Cowherd Podcast - Joe Burrow on Game Winning Week 6 TD Pass , Viral Coughing Video
description:
First, (3:00) Colin explains why Steve Kerr’s initial reaction to the Draymond Green viral video showed his true feelings on the situation, and what’s really behind Russell Wilson’s dramatic drop off in Denver.

Then, Bengals Quarterback Joe Burrow joins Colin to discuss the Bengals week 6 win over the Saints in New Orleans (12:00), what he saw on his game winning 60-yard TD pass to Ja’Marr Chase (13:00), how his understanding of the QB position has changed since his rookie year (18:00), why he feels comfortable coming from behind (20:00), why he transferred from Ohio State to LSU (26:00), his first impression of Ed Orgeron (27:00), if he holds a grudge against Ohio state for not giving him a shot (28:00), his recall of passes to some of the lesser known targets in his NFL career (31:00), how he plans to stay focused heading into a softer part of the schedule (37:00), the real story behind the viral “cough video” (39:00), and what common phobias he’s scared or not scared of (40:00).

Follow Colin and The Volume on Twitter for the latest content and updates, check out FanDuel for the best wagering and daily fantasy action, and visit Cuts for the latest Fall fits! #Herd #Volume

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
